scripts.install:deps: .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ./.venv/bin/pip install pandas sqlalchemy mysql-connector-python plotly jieba nltk wordcloud || .\.venv\Scripts\pip install pandas sqlalchemy mysql-connector-python plotly jieba nltk wordcloud
scripts.setup: npm run setup:venv && npm run install:deps
scripts.dev: npm run setup && npm run gateway
